name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - L  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Laptop.

	Laptop is a cocker spaniel.  He's a very light brown and has dark brown paws. "Take that computer off your kneeThat's the place that I should beThere couldn't be a better fitThan a lap with a dog on it!"

questions.text: Which of these is a feline?
questions.explanation:
Leelo.

	Leelo is a leopard.  She easily stands on all four feet.  She has a white chest and face. "With my teeth so sharp and whiteYou might worry that I'll biteAnd that's just what I may doIf you have French fries with you!"

questions.text: Which of these is a fairytale creature?
questions.explanation:
Legend.

	Legend is a purple dragon.  He has a golden brown chest and also has golden brown wings. "Many tales have been toldOf ladies fair in days of oldSome say the knight would win the dayBut this dragon says, "No way"!"

questions.text: Which of these is an amphibian?
questions.explanation:
Legs.

	Legs is a green frog.  He is one of the oldest Beanie Babies, so he is very hard to find. "Legs lives in a hollow logLegs likes to play leap frogIf you like to hang out at the lakeLegs will be the new friend you'll make!"

questions.text: Which of these is a horse?
questions.explanation:
Lightning.

	Lightning is a white horse with gray spots.  She also has white hair. "I love to run across the plainsSo get a good grip on the reinsWe'll go so fast, we'll almost flyAnd watch the world go zooming by!"

questions.text: Which of these is a lion?
questions.explanation:
Linah.

	Linah is shaped just like Leelo, and is, in fact, related to her.  Of course, it isn't an adult lion, so it doesn't have a mane. "King of the jungle, yep that's me Most fearsome beast you'll ever see And as your king, this cat decrees Give my a back scratch, if you please!"

questions.text: Which of these is a fish?
questions.explanation:
Lips.

	Lips is a mainly orange fish with red polkadots.  Her tail is multicolored, as is her face, and her fins are blue, purple, and pink.  She also puckers her lips, which are bright red. "Did you ever see a fish like me?I'm the most colorful in the seaTraveling with friends in a schoolSwimming all day is really cool!"

questions.text: Which of these bears does not sit like the rest?
questions.explanation:
Logger.

	Logger doesn't actually sit; he lies down.  He is very furry, and is all brown. "Under the leafy canopyOf my very favorite treeI'll sit down and have some snacksNo better place to just relax!"

questions.text: Which of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Lollipup.

	Lollipup is a white bichon frise.  She is very fuzzy. ""YIP," means I want to play with you When I say, "YAP," I'm happy, too"ARF," implies that this is funAnd "BARK" is "Join in everyone"!"

questions.text: Which of these is a farm bird?
questions.explanation:
Lurkey.

	Although all of these animals can be found on the farm, Lurkey is the only bird.  Lullaby is a lamb, Luau is a pig, and Lefty is a donkey.  Lurkey is gray with dark gray spots.  His head is blue with dark blue spots, and he has a red waddle.  His feet are a reddish brown, and the tips of his wings and tail are white and black fuzzy hair.  Right below the fuzzy hair he has red stripes. "Thanksgiving is my special dayBut there's something I must sayWhen you sit down with your forkMake sure your plate is full of pork!"
